item.title: Connecting to MS SQL Server in R
item.description: There are dozens of ways to connect to an MS SQL Server database in R. You can use a number of packages, and within those packages, there are various methods for connecting and running SQL queries via an R script. The easiest method I’ve found for a traditional Windows user with access to an MS SQL Server instance is what I’m going to demonstrate. Setting up a System DSN In Windows, if you hit the start menu and search for “odbc”, you’ll get an app called “ODBC Data Source Administrator (64-bit).
